title: Luxury House for Sale - Pelawatta
details:
A newly build super luxury house situated at Jayanthi Mawatha,Pelawatte, just 100 meters from the Pelawatte junction is for sale.
This beautiful house has easy access to Banks, International School, Supermarkets, Shopping Arcades and other conveniences.
House comprise of;
* 10p land area with 20ft roadway
* 3700 sqft Floor area which is fully tiled
* Small garden in front
* 4 bedrooms with 4 attached bathrooms
* All 4 rooms with Air- condition
* 1 living room,1 dining room ,TV lounge and balcony
* 2 parking available with automatic space door
* Provision for Generator
* The Doors,Windows and stairway with Teak Wood
* Imported light fittings and Grohe,Roca bathroom fittings
* Overhead water tank,a sump and solar hot water system
* German make Pantry
* Entertainment Area

Price LKR 65 Million
